title: Forcefield

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Protect someone each night, making them immune to all non-Coven harmful effects.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you have the Necronomicon, you may instead choose to use all Coven roles' non-Necronomicon harmful effects on them. You must also choose all additional targets for those effects, like who you're redirecting them into.

desc:
Post 109
*Magic barriers. Made out of popcorn.*
